title: Give Us More Lakers-Clippers, Free Zion, and the Seeding Race | The Mismatch
description:
Verno and KOC discuss the thrilling kickoff of seeding games in Orlando: Clippers-Lakers (0:42) and Jazz-Pelicans (32:51). Then, they preview the weekend’s upcoming games (59:18).
Hosts: Chris Vernon and Kevin O’Connor
